Comments
There are always campus police roaming around on campus.
I am also a part of APO- which is Alpha Phi Omega. There are also a lot of other Greek organizations on campus.
There are a lot of activities and clubs on campus. I am apart of AASA- African American Student Association.
All kinds of students you just have to find where you fit in on campus.
Every year Ferrum College throws a huge event for ReLay for Life.
There is a dollar tree down the road from campus.
There is always on campus going on to get the students engaged.
The food in the cafe is okay but there is not that much variety on campus.
The dorms are okay and they are a nice size.
It is very great the teachers help you out with everything. Also there are other students there that is more than willing to help you out.
Get to know people on campus because they will help you out a lot.
It is a very nice school. It has a lot of activities for students to engage in. There are a lot of nice people on campus also.

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot You really learn a lot here at Ferrum you just have to be willing to do the work Ferrum has really great Professors as well. Login to rate or flag the reviews Anneleisse from Castle Rock, CO 04/29/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 3 of 29 Categories Comments Campus Safety Campus police are seen 24/7 so it's a pretty safe campus. Resident assistance is always available also. Clubs and Activities Ferrum does have a variety of Greek clubs, from national ones to local one too. There is an outdoor club for those who enjoy the outdoors. We also have a handful of sport teams and for those who don't want to be on an actual team we also have intramurals.
